name: Appelsbosch Hospital
physical_address: From PMB, take Greytown road and then take Wartburg rd. Go past Wartburg, do not turn at Dalton, carry on until you reach the sugar mill, then turn right and pass Fawnleas, Glenside, Montebello and Appelsbosch Supermarket (on left). Then look for sign for Appelsbosch hospital

name: Bethesda Hospital
physical_address: N2 North to Mkuze, left at T-junction, 3 km to Ubombo, turn right and go 18 km

name: Catherine Booth Hospital
physical_address: N2 North from Gingindlovu to Amatikulu Sugar Mill, turn right and travel 12 km along gravel road through sugar cane and banana fields until you reach the hospital.  The route is well sign-posted.

name: Ceza Hospital
physical_address: Go to Ulundi , from King Dinizulu Highway go about 20 km's North to Ceza hospital.

name: Charles James Hospital
physical_address: No. 6 Sompukane Road, Ezimbokodweni 4125. (Old south coast main road)

name: Church of Scotland Hospital
physical_address: On the Greytown road go through Greytown and look for a board saying Tugela Ferry. Turn left at that board and go on until you reach Tugela Ferry town. On the left and right you will see shops. Look for board on your right saying hospital.

name: Doris Goodwin Hospital
physical_address: Edendale road, next to Edendale hospital

name: E.G & Usher Memorial hospital
physical_address: Corner of The Avenue & Elliot Streets, Kokstad

name: Ekombe Hospital
physical_address: From Melmoth proceed to Nkandla, before your reach Nkandla watch and take the turn off to Eqhudeni and Vuleka. From there drive about 30 km until you take the turn off to Eqhudeni, then you’ll drive 5 km to Ekombe Hospital.

name: Eshowe Hospital
physical_address: From N2 North take the Dokoweni off-ramp. Follow signs to Eshowe (30 km).  Take the second entrance to Eshowe, Kangela St. Hospital is 1,8 km from this entrance on the left hand side

name: General Justice Gizenga Mpanza Regional Hospital (formerly Stanger Hospital)
physical_address: Cnr of King Sharka & Patterson Street, Stanger

name: Greytown Hospital
physical_address: Go to Greytown and take Bell street and ask for hospital that is next to township

name: Itshelejuba Hospital
physical_address: N2 North, about 30 km past Pongola and +- 70km from Piet Ritief

name: King Dinuzulu Hospital Complex
physical_address: Corner of Dr R D Naidoo drive and Viola Road  Sydenham Durban

name: King Edward VIII Hospital
physical_address: Corner of Sydney and Francois Road, Congella

name: Manguzi Hospital
physical_address: N2 North, Jozini turn-off, past Pongola Dam + 30km to T-junction, right + 67km

name: Mbongolwane Hospital
physical_address: N2 to Ulundi/Melmoth turn-off, left at Eshowe/Nkandla turn-off + 30 km to Ntumeni, left to Pett Store, turn right, +15 km to school, turn right, + 3 km

name: Mosvold Hospital
physical_address: N2 North, Jozini turn-off, past Pongola Dam + 30km to T-junction, left + 30km

name: Mseleni Hospital
physical_address: N2 North, Jozini turn-off, turn right to Ubombo before Dam, + 20 km to T-junction, left + 20 km to 2nd T-junction, left + 5 km to sign

name: Murchison Hospital
physical_address: N2 south to Port Shepstone THEN Mdube Bus Halt, Harding Road, Port Shepstone

name: Ngwelezana Hospital
physical_address: Left at 1st robot into Ngwelezana road on Entering Empangeni, look for signboard on left and turn into Thanduyise road and continue for 500m.

name: Nkandla Hospital
physical_address: N2 north to Gingindlovu/Eshowe turn-off, past Eshowe and Melmoth to Babanango turn-off, turn left to Nkandla village.

name: Nkonjeni Hospital
physical_address: Go to Ulundi , from King Dinizulu Highway go +\- 5 km's north to Nkonjeni hospital : Near Vumabakushoyo LP. School and Lutheran Church

name: Port Shepstone Hospital
physical_address: N2 south to Port Shepstone THEN Cnr of Connor & Bazley Street, Port Shepstone

name: Prince Mshiyeni Hospital
physical_address: On the Mangosutho Highway, Before Umlazi Lodge.

name: Queen Nandi  Hospital
physical_address: 29 Union Street, Empangeni. This is Empangeni Hospital

name: Rietvlei Hospital
postal_address: P/Bag X501 Stafford's Post Via Port Shepstone 4686

name: St. Francis Hospital
physical_address: Go to Ulundi , from King Dinizulu Highway go +\- 7 km's north east to St. Francis hospital :Near St Francis Mission

name: Thulasizwe Hospital
physical_address: Go to Ulundi , from King Dinizulu Highway go +\- 20 km's north to Ceza hospital : THEN +\- 5km's north to Thulasizwe Hospital ,near Thandaziphi Store

name: Umphumulo Hospital
physical_address: N2 North, Stanger turn-off, continue + 45 km to Maphumulu, look for hospital sign.

name: Untunjambili Hospital
physical_address: Along Kranskop way. From N2 take R74 off-ramp, go through Stanger on R74 pass Mapumulo, after 23km see Kranskop sign, turn right.  Pass through small Kranskop town after 10km sign Untunjambili Hospital. Turn right after 2km see hospital on your right.
